body:
### Welcome

Scribble is a fun way for people of all ages to learn about Generative Art using a simple drap-and-drop programming interface. Scribble programs can be written by anyone, even without prior coding experience. To get started, download Scribble for your operating system and check out some of the example files included with the program. To learn more about creating your own Scribble artwork, check out the short video tutorials on YouTube.

### Downloads

Get the latest version for your operating system below:

* Mac OS X: [Scribble-0.0.5.dmg](https://github.com/downloads/monofonik/scribble/Scribble-0.0.5.dmg)
* Windows: [Scribble-0.0.5.exe](https://github.com/downloads/monofonik/scribble/Scribble-0.0.5.exe)

### Features
As well as retaining all the functionality of the original Scratch, Scribble also allows for:

* Transparency - both the _pen_ and the _stamp_ tools can have their transparency controlled using the _ghosting_ effect
* Shapes - An entire new palette of shapes blocks allows any type of shape you can think of to be drawn on the canvas, complete with border and fill colours
* Text - The _text_ palette included with Scribble allows the generation of text to be specified in programs

### Examples
Check out some of the artwork that's been created with Scribble!

![gridlocked](http://i35.photobucket.com/albums/d156/aliendigit/scribble/gridlocked.png)
Gridlocked

![spirals](http://i35.photobucket.com/albums/d156/aliendigit/scribble/spirals.png)
Spiral Escape

![mosaic](http://i35.photobucket.com/albums/d156/aliendigit/scribble/mosaic.png)
Mosaic

![spirograph](http://i35.photobucket.com/albums/d156/aliendigit/scribble/spirograph_2.jpg)
Spirograph Generator

### Authors and Contributors
Scribble was developed by Jonathan Mullins (@monofonik) for Monash University. Scribble is based on the BYOB incarnation of Scratch.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Scribble? Email jmullins@monash.edu or submit a support ticket on the Scribble GitHub page.
name: Scribble
tagline: Scribble is a program for creating Generative Art, based on Scratch by the MIT
